AdditionalNumber.name: AdditionalNumber
AdditionalNumber.description: Represents an optional additional number for a call center. This additional number is visible in the call center's phone directory.

CallCenterId.description: System field that contains the ID of the user who created the call center associated with this additional number. If value is null, this additional number is displayed in every call center's phone directory.

Description.description: Description of the additional number, such as Conference Room B.Limit: 255 characters.

Name.description: The name of the additional number.Limit: 80 characters.

Phone.description: The phone number that corresponds to this additional number.
